title: Did the U.S. government find guilty of the murder of Martin Luther King Jr.?
subtitle: The conspiracy theories believe that the U.S. government was prosecuted and found guilty for the murder of a civil rights icon, but the media refused to report it.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The U.S. government was prosecuted and found guilty of the murder of Martin Luther King Jr., but the media refused to report her.
